modal-text-0: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the personal information of visitors to our animal shelter website. We are committed to ensuring the privacy and security of your personal information and comply with applicable data protection laws. By accessing and using our website, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
modal-text-1-1: Personal Information: When you interact with our website, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and address. This information is voluntarily provided by you when you submit forms, make donations, or contact us.
modal-text-1-2: Non-Personal Information: We may also collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and device information. This information is collected automatically through cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience.
modal-text-2-1: We use the personal information you provide to respond to your inquiries, process donations, and provide updates about our animal shelter activities.
modal-text-2-2: Non-personal information is used to analyze website usage, improve our website's functionality and content, and enhance your overall experience.
modal-text-3-1: We do not sell, rent, or disclose your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
modal-text-3-2: We may share your personal information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering our services. These providers are bound by confidentiality obligations and are prohibited from using your information for any other purpose.
modal-text-4-1: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
modal-text-4-2: However, please note that no method of data transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
modal-text-5: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of those websites before providing any personal information.
modal-text-6: Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child without parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information from our servers.
modal-text-7: You have the right to access, update, and delete your personal information held by us. If you wish to exercise any of these rights or have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us using the contact information provided below.
modal-text-8: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised policy on our website. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates.
